Have you been able to get this happening consistantly?  This is almost certianly
related to our fix for Bug 65835.
*** Bug 67871 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I've found a way to reproduce this.  Open a bunch of editors, enough that a
chevron is created.  Ensure that one of the last opened editors is selected. 
Shutdown and restart.  You'll get a warning on startup that an editor cannot be
restored and that message in your log.  Strangely, this doesn't happen on Windows.

I can confirm these reproduce steps.  Open a sequence of editors, and then 
shutdown Eclipse.

Fix in HEAD.  This was again due to the magic we try and do with the bounds
checking.  Certain checks were not working on linux and we weren't decrementing
an insertion index.
Closing to keep a tidy house.  Pardon the spam.
